about_the_game:
GILLES is the Gilles Villeneuve Metaverse.
A Point and Click Story Driven Graphic Adventure.

Shows the Journey of a Theather Director's 10 years exile to write a Theater Play of his Great Work, The Klown.
Gilles settles alone while he waits Sam Path and his crew to arrive and join him on his Journey to show the The Klown's Great Premiere.

You take the role of Gilles, while he writes and plays his Great Work, a new Play called The Klown. Investigate all the details of his House and Theater to discover the history of the people who live there and find out more about the mysterious Klown. Unravel the events of a family's lives by investigating what they do and what this is all about.

Discover the mystery behind the Theather Courtains and this new Universe throught GILLES eyes. This psychological Dark Fantasy Horror thriller shows you the 10 years exile of a Writer. An immersive Reality: Go back and forward in time from the 1980s to the 2020s, when visiting a home where every detail has been carefully recreated, as the sounds of a storm and thunder bolts outside envelop you in the experience. As Gilles's writing creates a new Story and it's Universe, his Visions about it become more and more Real.

The boundaries between Fantasy and Reality are now fading away.

- Gilles is the first episode of a virtual experience that allows you to explore Gilles Villeneuve's creations. This Game works like an interactive virtual museum growing environment, is a Point and Click game.

- No combat, no guns. GILLES is an immersive experience that invites you to experience at your own pace, without being attacked, stuck, or frustrated. This World just wants you to explore it. There are so many hidden secrets that you need to find out by yourself.

- Graphic interactive investigation: Find out what happened to the Sampaio family by examining a house full of family belongings, notes, letters, pictures and videos you found. Use your powers of observation to put together a story that unfolds as you explore.

- A compact narrative experience: On this first episode, in the course of one to two hours, you will discover the story of Gilles, Sam Path, the Wizardry and secrets behind the house in Porto das Dunas. The amount of discoveries depends on the depth with which you follow each small trail in this dense space full of secret stories.

- Next-gen cinematic, sound, imagery, character and environment design are combined with a rich storyline that twists and turns.
More than a RPG, more than a Point and Click, more than a Story Driven exploration game, a Reality System from Infiniti Studio.

There is no End here, is just you and the Time that you still have.
You gonna wish stay in Porto das Dunas FOREVER, and EVER.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or higher
  • Processor: 1.80GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: (NOTE: Intel HD Graphic 4000 NOT CURRENTLY SUPPORTED on Windows 8)

short_description: GILLES shows the Journey of a Theather Director's 10 years exile to create his Great Work, his Theather Play named The Klown. On this first episode, join him and SamPath on their Journey to show the Great Premiere. GILLES is a story exploration game from Infiniti Studio.
